message.body: Made it home before 9 am. Unbelievable. It was SO nice to see you and screen and work together. Hope we get to do it again before our bodies get old and fall apart. Ha

glad you made it back so quickly! so nice to see you and screen and shoot together! thank you so much for helping, couldn't have done it without you. i really enjoyed working together again, making the shot "diagram" etc - miss that! i think my body already is falling apart!
I totally forgot about my piece of glass to shoot thru!
